title: Project Alpha
subtitle: Mobile App Development
description: Working on the new user authentication flow with improved security measures and better UX patterns. This includes implementing biometric authentication, secure token storage, and seamless user onboarding experience.

title: Team Meeting
subtitle: Sprint Planning
description: Weekly standup to discuss progress, blockers, and plan the next sprint activities. We'll review completed tasks, address any technical debt, and prioritize upcoming features.

title: Design Review
subtitle: UI/UX Feedback
description: Review session for the new dashboard design with the design team and stakeholders. We'll evaluate the user interface, discuss accessibility improvements, and finalize the design system updates.

title: Code Review
subtitle: Feature Branch
description: Review pull request for the new notification system implementation. This includes push notifications, in-app notifications, and notification preferences management.
